game.name: Seven Kingdoms: Ancient Adversaries
game.shortDescription: Conquer the world and build your empire! Lead one civilization to glory through sophisticated trade, diplomacy, espionage and conquest.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Conquer the world and build your empire! Lead one civilization to glory through sophisticated trade, diplomacy, espionage and conquest.

reviewHighlights.text: 구닥다리 그래픽이지만 경제 경영 전투 rpg 외교 스파이질 수호신소환까지 다 들어있다!
To me, this was one of the greatest RTS classics of all time along with C&C and Warcraft2. Must-buy if you are great fan of classic RTS. Hope it provi...
